m_szDocTitle: Apparatus and method of providing road guidance based on augmented reality head-up display - Hyundai Motor Company
m_szDocSumamry: textArticle -------------------- Apparatus and method of providing road guidance based on augmented reality head-up display United States Patent 9151634 Abstract: An apparatus and method of providing road guidance based on an augmented reality head-up display (HUD) are provided. The method includes creating, by a controller, a route toward a destination and operating the augmented reality HUD to display a virtual preceding vehicle driven along the route to show that the virtual preceding vehicle is driven in front of a traveling vehicle by a reference distance. Inventors: Ann, Yun Sup (Seoul,
